attributes.action: Increase the proposed pay rise for NHS staff
attributes.additional_details:
It is an insult to those who have worked 24 x 7 throughout the pandemic, and in more normal times, provide care and expertise that must be recognised. 
The majority are incapable of dining their jobs.
attributes.background:
The Government should recognise the efforts, commitments and sacrifices the NHS staff have made, not only throughout this pandemic, but in their normal working lives.
A 1% pay rise is derisory.
Please sign to fight this wrong.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Please give the NHS Covid Heroes a bigger pay rise.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/577970

Recognise all members of NHS nursing profession by giving them a 12.5% pay rise
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/560253
